name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
AI Architect with over 13 years of experience in cloud computing, specializing in **Azure**, **Azure AI**, and **AI/ML** solutions. Proficient in **C#**, **Python**, **TypeScript**, and MLOps methodologies, including model training and orchestration utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Expert in developing complex applications with **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, while focusing on CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) using **Terraform** and **Bicep**.
Demonstrated ability to implement data-driven strategies using **LangChain**, **Semantic Kernel**, and **RAG** techniques to enhance predictive analytics and automation workflows. Experienced in the deployment of microservices-based architectures leveraging **Docker** and **AKS** within Azure ecosystems. Exceptional communication and pre-sales skills, ensuring alignment with client requirements and regulatory compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities, enhancing team dynamics and project outcomes.
